Package ohos.agp.render

Class Paint.FontMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.render.Paint.FontMetrics
  • Enclosing class:
    Paint

    public static class Paint.FontMetrics
extends Object
    Describes fonts of the same size in multiple metrics.
    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      float ascent
      Indicates the font ascent, that is, the distance from the font's baseline to the top of a character.
      float bottom
      Indicates the maximum descent of the font.
      float descent
      Indicates the font ascent, that is, the distance from the font's baseline to the bottom of a character.
      float leading
      Indicates the leading, that is, the space to be reserved between the descent of a line and the ascent of the next line.
      float top
      Indicates the maximum ascent of the font.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      FontMetrics​(float top, float ascent, float descent, float bottom, float leading)
      A constructor used to create a FontMetrics instance based on the specified maximum ascent and descent, font ascent and descent, and leading.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • ascent

        public float ascent
        Indicates the font ascent, that is, the distance from the font's baseline to the top of a character. Some characters might extend above the font ascent line.

      • bottom

        public float bottom
        Indicates the maximum descent of the font. No character extends further below the font's baseline than this height.

      • descent

        public float descent
        Indicates the font ascent, that is, the distance from the font's baseline to the bottom of a character. Some characters might extend below the font descent line.

      • leading

        public float leading
        Indicates the leading, that is, the space to be reserved between the descent of a line and the ascent of the next line.

      • top

        public float top
        Indicates the maximum ascent of the font. No character extends further above the font's baseline than this height.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FontMetrics

        public FontMetrics​(float top,
                   float ascent,
                   float descent,
                   float bottom,
                   float leading)
        A constructor used to create a FontMetrics instance based on the specified maximum ascent and descent, font ascent and descent, and leading.
        Parameters:
        top - Indicates the maximum ascent of the font described by this FontMetrics object.
        ascent - Indicates the distance from the font's baseline to the top of a character.
        descent - Indicates the distance from the font's baseline to the bottom of a character.
        bottom - Indicates the maximum descent of the font described by this FontMetrics object.
        leading - Indicates the space to be reserved between the descent of a line and the ascent of the next line.
